query:
ALTER TABLE componentCalculations 
ADD COLUMN corrosionRateLongTerm DECIMAL(10, 6) AFTER corrosionAllowance,
ADD COLUMN corrosionRateShortTerm DECIMAL(10, 6) AFTER corrosionRateLongTerm,
ADD COLUMN governingRateType ENUM('long_term', 'short_term', 'nominal') AFTER corrosionRate,
ADD COLUMN governingRateReason TEXT AFTER governingRateType,
ADD COLUMN dataQualityStatus ENUM('good', 'anomaly', 'growth_error', 'below_minimum', 'confirmed') DEFAULT 'good' AFTER remainingLife,
ADD COLUMN dataQualityNotes TEXT AFTER dataQualityStatus,
ADD COLUMN excludeFromCalculation BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE AFTER dataQualityNotes;

ADD COLUMN dataQualityStatus ENUM('good', 'anomaly', 'growth_error', 'below_minimum', 'confirmed') DEFAULT 'good' AFTER remainingLife,
